summary: The module implements view utilities that generate KML and KMZ representations of geographic sitemap data. It inspects model geometry fields, optionally transforms coordinate systems, and uses Django GIS shortcuts to render the appropriate XML or compressed KML output, raising HTTP errors when necessary.
business_intent: Enable web applications to expose their spatial content as KML/KMZ sitemaps, allowing search engines and mapping services to index and display geographic information from Django sites.
